output.sentences: It was my sister's wedding and my daughter was the flower girl.
The day started well with both arriving at the church together and on time.
The congregation watched on as they said their vows.
Afterwards they took the wedding photos
Then it was off to the reception for speeches, dinner and the very important task of cutting the cake!
